meanings.sent1: I enjoy soaping my hands to get rid of dirt.
meanings.sent2: She is soaping the dishes after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked surprised as I started soaping its fur.
meanings.sent4: The rain was soaping the city streets, washing away the grime.
meanings.sent5: Soaping the car made it shine like new.

meanings.definition: The act of cleaning with soap.
meanings.sent1: Soaping is an important part of personal hygiene.
meanings.sent2: After a day of gardening, she enjoys a relaxing soaping in the bath.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they played with bubbles during soaping.
meanings.sent4: The soaping of the windows made them sparkle in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The pleasant scent of soaping filled the bathroom.
